You take a few steps forwards and feel a blessing fall upon you. You are rested, your wounds are healed and you just feel really happy.
As you stand there, basking in the new feeling, a woman appears out of the lake and speaks in a calm, yet commanding voice:
'Welcome, Knights of Arathorn. You are far from Camroth, yet I, the Lady of the Lake, will grant your knightly boon, as it was agreed.'

Adventure.name: TreasureCaveSpawn
Adventure.nodes: You find the cave where a treasure may lie. It looks old and abandoned, but there is an eerie feeling to it.
You leave the cave and just as you step outside, there is a small earthquake. It does no harm to you, but the cave collapses.

You explore the cave and find a small hidden chamber, just as you were instructed. Within lies a large treasure chest.
The air in the small chamber smells funny, and it makes your lungs hurt.
You suspect there might be some poison here, so if you want to get the chest, you will have to endure the effects.
You fought through whatever poisonous trap guarded this place, and you got the treasure chest out!
Você não consegue suportar o ar venenoso, e alguns de vocês se sentem muito doentes. Ainda assim, você consegue agarrar o baú.
Inside the chest, you find some treasure.

Inside the chest, you discover the equipment and notes of an herbalist. There is also an old scroll that reads:
'With my last breath upon this dark land, I bestow my wisdom upon ye who reads this?'
One of you feels a sudden surge of knowledge.

Você entra na caverna e vê que ela não está tão vazia quanto parecia à primeira vista. Há vários ursos dormindo profundamente em uma das câmaras. Pelas instruçoes que você recebeu, você sabe onde procurar o tesouro, mas isso exigirá que você passe pela câmara do urso.
You sneak past the bears and they remain soundly asleep. You enter the hidden chamber that you were told about, and you find a treasure chest waiting within.

The chest must have belonged to a craftsman. There are a lot of bolts and screws that you've only seen Goblins use; there are one or two gadgets still intact and some other materials. There is also a scroll, and when one of you reads it, it seems to pass on some knowledge!

The chest must have belonged to a hunter or maybe an herbalist. You find some good wicker that can be used to make baskets, some leathers, herbs and even a bow. When you take the bow, some old hunter knowledge flows into you!

The bears wake in time to see your approach, and they fight you off without any trouble.
Luckily, the slumber makes them sluggish enough so they are slow in their pursuit.
As you run out of the cave, a small quake shakes the ground, and the bear hideout collapses on top of the raging beasts.
The treasure is gone, but at least the bears are too.
You beat the bears and make your way into the hidden chamber, where a treasure chest awaits you!

The bears wake in time to see your approach, and they fight you off without any trouble.
Luckily, the slumber makes them sluggish enough so they are slow in their pursuit.
As you run out of the cave, a small quake shakes the ground, and the bear hideout collapses on top of the raging beasts.
The treasure is gone, but at least the bears are too.

You go into the dark cave and find a small hidden chamber within.
Before you lies a golden chalice atop a stone-clad chest.
There are runes carved into the stone, and those of you who know about magic recognise the runes as a protection spell.
You break the protection spell, and the chalice and chest are yours for the taking.
You take the loot and leave the cave, and as you do, you feel a blessing has lingered on your souls after the ritual.
Você não consegue quebrar o feitiço de proteção e o baú explode! A caverna inteira começa a tremer e você mal consegue sair a tempo antes de desabar.
Você entra na caverna e encontra o local onde deveria estar a câmara escondida com seu tesouro, mas a entrada está cheia de escombros. Na verdade, toda a caverna parece instável.
You dig your way into the hidden chamber and reclaim the promised treasure chest.

Você abre o baú e descobre que está cheio de pequenos pedaços redondos de metal. Você acha que isso costumava ser chamado de ?moedas? e as pessoas os usavam para o comércio antes da Escuridão. Há também algumas gemas brilhantes.

You open the chest and it is filled with trinkets and frills. There are mirrors, hair brushes and all sorts of items. Some of the trinkets are still usable.
When one of you picks up a pretty-looking mirror and looks into it, they hear:
'You are now the prettiest of them all'
Your fellow villager grows more attractive and eloquent, in front of your very eyes!.
You try to dig the treasure out when the whole cave begins to shake violently. You barely make it out in one piece before it collapses.

Adventure.name: DDDragon
Adventure.nodes:
A great, ancient gold dragon and his swarming minions have descended upon your lands! In your minds, you hear a roar:
'I will have your gold, now, but if you leave me be, I will move on from this place.'
The dragon sits itself atop a great tower risen from the ground, and you know you will need all of your people at once to try and defeat it!
The dragon proved stronger, but luckily it only took the gold.

Your ritual works and the dragon bows to you:
'Apologies, I assumed I am dealing with filthy peasants, and not with those who wield magic. Have your gold back and stay on the road of wisdom!'
He flies away, and some of you feel stronger in magic.
'A virgin, why? Is he made of gold? Hmm, okay, I will have this virgin of yours, why not...'

The dragon takes the virgin and looks a bit confused as to what to do with them. Finally, he growls at you:
'This does not satisfy me, it isn't even a virgin, as you advertise, and even if it was, it's worthless!'
The dragon remains on top of its tower, and takes the gold again.'

The dragon takes the virgin and looks a bit confused as to what to do with them. Finally, he decides to eat the poor soul, but as he does, he chokes on them and falls dead while his minions run away in fear of your tricks!
The dragon takes the virgin and looks a bit confused as to what to do with them. Finally, he decides to just take them on his back and flies away with his entire entourage.

Adventure.name: Wildwives
Adventure.nodes: Um grupo de mulheres voluptuosas e altas, cobertas de pêlo comprido, com olhos grandes e caídos descem do topo da montanha! Eles estão carregando tacos pesados. Você sabe que elas são as esposas selvagens - lendárias por terem sobrevivido à Escuridão no topo das montanhas, alimentando-se de seus homens! Outros contos os têm emparelhado com Trolls da montanha, como suas noivas selvagens. Em suma, não há boas histórias sobre essas meninas.
You have snuck past the strange women as they continue their wild rampage down the mountain path.
You tried to sneak away but the wildwives notice you.
You run away and left the strange creatures well behind you!

You tried running, but they were faster. The strange thing is, they seemed to be running besides you, then took over, then just kept their distance as if the run was some game. They do not seem aggressive. A couple try to come closer to you.
You leave and they do not stop you.

The wildwives slow their descent and approach you cautiously, stopping at a speaking distance, but their large clubs are raised in a defensive stance.
Now that you look closer upon them, you're no longer sure if they have fur, or perhaps they're just wearing strange armour, and up close, they no longer look so inhuman, just scarred by the wilderness and clearly not used to 'civilised' contact. One of them sniffs the air, then speaks to you in a low, gruff voice:
'You talk to us?'
'Food, you give food we give shiny stone to you?'

The woman seems unsure of what you mean. But when you take out your goods and show them to her, she does the same. You see a small crate of some metals. She places them on the ground and gestures for you to do the same. Clearly they do not wish to have any contact with you.
You place your goods on the ground and they do the same, then they disappear into the mountains, leaving both bundles on the ground.
You take both bundles and leave, but before long, you hear the ground grumbling beneath your feet and an avalanche catches you unaware!
Você ultrapassou a avalanche, mas foi por pouco! Você sente como se alguém estivesse te observando do alto das colinas? Pelo menos você aprendeu alguma coisa sobre essas esposas selvagens.
You run from the avalanche, but you only make it by the skin of your teeth! Many of your people are seriously wounded, and some are weakened by the cold or perhaps something more.
You charge the wildwives, but before you can reach them, they effortlessly climb up the mountain passes leaving you far behind!

Adventure.name: Spiritcatcher
Adventure.nodes: Outra noite cai sobre Thea e as almas inquietas dos condenados procuram os vivos com inveja e raiva. Você quase pode sentir a onda se aproximando desses espectros infernais procurando sobrecarregar suas almas! Mas esta noite, um convidado bem-vindo é visto nas sombras: um lapiduch, o apanhador de espíritos. Esta criatura de aparência bizarra, semelhante a um sapo crescido, com garras longas, verrugas amarelas e uma fileira de dentes afiados, é na verdade um humilde servo de Veles, nos velhos tempos, encarregado de caçar almas rebeldes e fantasmas malcomportados, mas agora, irremediavelmente superalimentado e sempre ocupado com sua tarefa de devorar espíritos malignos!
Thanks to the lapiduch, your people sleep well this night and many feel the magical touch of Marovit upon them!
Thanks to the Lapiduch, your people sleep well this night and they feel strengthened the next morning!
Thanks to the Lapiduch, your people sleep well this night and one wakes with greater resolve!

Adventure.name: Treasureboy
Adventure.nodes: A child of perhaps six, stands in your way. As you get closer to him, you see the child is no ordinary human. His skin is silvery, his eyes seem golden, his hair looks like strands of very thin metal and as he hops around gleefully, you hear the clunking of coins.

O menino não responde apenas sorri para você e começa a brincar com uma bola, mas permanece próximo ao seu grupo, e olha para você de vez em quando, como se esperasse algo. Seus olhos dourados medem você com a tenacidade de um gato selvagem brincando com sua presa. Você acha que isso pode ser o lendário menino do tesouro, um demônio da sorte menor que pode trazer muita fortuna! Mas, qual foi a maneira de obtê-lo? Havia algo em sua cabeça, ou rosto, ou corpo??
You pat the treasureboy's head, but he just looks up at you and laughs then disappears!

You pat the treasureboy's head, but he just looks up at you and smiles:
'Surprisingly kind, so I may change my mind and give you a find.'
The treasureboy bows and disappears, but in his place there remain some precious stones for you.
Você bate no garoto do tesouro com o bastão e ele ri histericamente e depois desaparece!

You slap the treasureboy in the face and he smiles:
'A slap in the face is no disgrace and now you will taste my place!'
The boy slaps you in return, but with the slap you are showered with precious metals.

You slap the treasureboy in the face and he smiles:
'A tender slap deserves a clap, but it can make me snap!'
The boy makes a sudden move and changes into a golden dragon!

Você foge como se a própria morte estivesse te perseguindo e você ouve a risada do menino atrás de você. O dragão respira um fogo dourado que envolve todos vocês! Você percebe que as chamas são doces e quentes e sente uma bênção sobre você.

You charge the dragon and it greets you with a breath of golden fire!
As the flames devour you all, you hear the boy:
'My, my, so ready to die! Instead have a golden pie!'
The dragon and the boy are no more, but you find a treasure chest.

Adventure.name: RedRidingWerewolf
Adventure.nodes: Making your way through the woodlands, you hear the cries of a child!
Você chega mais perto e vê uma jovem, talvez 10 anos, encolhida entre os arbustos, cercada por lobos rosnando! Quando os lobos cheiram você, eles uivam e fogem!

A criança se levanta e vai até você. Ela está vestindo um longo casaco vermelho enferrujado e tem duas tranças grossas saindo de um capuz: 'Obrigada! Obrigado estranhos! Mas agora você deve ir e salvar minha avó, oh, por favor, vá e salve-a!'
'My grannie, she lives far in the woods. I was there and the wolves came and she told me to run! But now you must go and save her!'

A criança faz uma carranca para você e você sente um calafrio na espinha... Agora que você pensa nisso, os olhos da menina parecem meio amarelados e estreitos, um pouco como um lobo... Você ouve os gritos dos lobos se fechando novamente e quando você olha para o céu, a lua fica vermelha.
Você mata os lobos e encontra a garotinha entre eles, meio transformada na forma de lobisomem! Você encontra um precioso colar de rubi nela, com um desenho dela e de uma mulher mais velha dentro.

Você foi derrotado e escapou por um triz! Por alguma razão, os lobos param de persegui-lo quando você passa por um pequeno riacho na floresta. Talvez fosse o território deles, ou talvez seus deuses estivessem cuidando de você??

The girl leads you to a solitary hut deep within these dark woods. An older woman appears at the door before you even knock.
There are no signs of fighting, or wolves, although you do see wolf tracks leading in and out of this place.
The woman speaks:
'Keep your distance! I dislike people and the feeling proves mutual on most occasions. Did my unwavering grandchild lead you here?'

You turn to point at the girl, but notice she is gone. The woman frowns and shakes her head:
'Stupid child, so stubborn, so wild. You should leave here, for I cannot hold myself calm this night!'
Suddenly you're very aware of the red, full moon, shining above your heads...

'No, wait! I, I almost backed out, but no, I must ask you for a terrible boon!
You see, the child that brought you here, she will not stop this madness.
She'll bring me gifts, every full moon, she'll torment me, never let me stow away the beast! But she never stays, afraid of my true anger. I was the one who killed her parents, not intentionally, nevertheless, they followed me and died and the child does not forgive.'

The old woman grabs her stomach in a sudden convulsion of pain. When she straightens again, her face is twisted and when she speaks, it's through a tightened jaw:
'She is away, of course, the snivelling cowardly pup that she is. She'll bring me gifts, every full moon, she'll torment me, never let me stow away the beast!
But she never stays, afraid of my true anger? I was the one who killed her parents, not intentionally, nevertheless, they followed me and died and the child does not forgive.?

'Why you, of course!
You are my sick gifts. Every full moon I lock myself here, warded against me leaving the circle, but she will not let me be! I am an ancient beast, a huntress of night, a werewolf if you must know.
But, I have sworn off killing and bloodshed! Yet, my primal urges cannot be tamed at full moon, only here can I stay safe. But, when she brings me people?'

'I prepared myself this time. I brought silver and elderflower cordial and it slows my transformation.
It pains me beyond words and I cannot ever do it myself? yet, something needs doing. My pup will only grow wilder and more bloodthirsty. You must hunt her down and kill her!
I will even give you an amulet, so you can track her easier. Just please, do it quick??

'Calm down, I wish you no harm. In fact, I wish no harm to anyone!
I prepared myself this time. I brought silver and elderflower cordial and it slows my transformation.
It pains me beyond words and I cannot ever do it myself yet, something needs doing. My pup will only grow wilder and more bloodthirsty. You must hunt her down and kill her!
I will even give you an amulet, so you can track her easier. Just please, do it quick?'
'There is none and time is running short now. You will do as you like. But leave now!'

A mulher acena com a cabeça e as lágrimas escorrem pelo seu rosto enquanto ela lhe entrega um pequeno amuleto de marfim, com uma flecha sempre apontando em uma direção: 'Aqui está o amuleto e minha bênção sobre você. Agora vá, pois sinto que minha mudança está chegando e você não deve ficar aqui!'

'Há! Eu não sigo nenhum deus nem minha linhagem. Talvez antigamente seus padres pudessem domá-la sim, mas não há tempo agora. Ela provou sangue humano, e pior, ela gosta. Ela é uma criança com o poder de liderar lobos. Uma criança zangada! Você deve acabar com isso agora!

'Very well, I understand, and even admire your compassion, it is rare to find in this dark world. Beware, my blood child will not be so kind to you!
May your eyes stay ever vigilant, your feet ever swift and your souls ever light.
Farewell, leave me now!'

Você mata o lobisomem e sua matilha que se juntaram a ela na luta! Você percebe que um deles era o cachorrinho - ela deve estar escondida nas proximidades, afinal. Dentro da pequena casa você encontra alguns objetos de valor.

You track down the girl and her fledgling pack of wolves. You are able to shoot them down before they even realise they've been spotted.
The girl's body is half turned into a wolf, but you still see the scared face of a child looking at you?
You find a precious ruby necklace on her, with a drawing of her and an older woman inside.
The pack notices you tracking them and chases you off, leaving several nasty bites!
Você domina o bando e eles se curvam a você, prometendo deixar este território e nunca mais voltar, nem prejudicar nenhum dos seus. Um do bando decide ficar com você para sempre.

'Yes, you are of the night blood too, and it may work. I am old, so I cannot try myself. But beware, dominated or not, my grandchild is a menace. Please act now, kill her or try your way. Good luck to you and thank you.'
Os lobos rosnam para você e estalam de raiva. São eles que mostram seu lugar na ordem do bando e então você se encolhe e se curva ao domínio deles. Mordido e humilhado, você foge.

The old woman looks at you as if she was about to comment on your kinship, but then she grabs her stomach in a sudden convulsion of pain. When she straightens again, her face is twisted and when she speaks, it's through a tightened jaw:
'She is away, of course, the snivelling cowardly pup that she is. She'll bring me gifts, every full moon, she'll torment me, never let me stow away the beast!
But she never stays, afraid of my true anger? I was the one who killed her parents, not intentionally, nevertheless, they followed me and died and the child does not forgive.'

'Yes! You are my sick gifts. Every full moon I lock myself here, warded against me leaving the circle, but she will not let me be! I am an ancient beast, a huntress of night, a Werewolf if you must know.
But, I have sworn off killing and bloodshed! Yet, my primal urges cannot be tamed at full moon, only here can I stay safe. But, when she brings me people?'

Adventure.name: Inventor
Adventure.nodes: Sua escola atraiu a atenção de um estudioso de aparência estranha. Ele diz que é um inventor. Ele está interessado em seus artesãos, pois eles são conhecidos por serem promissores no campo. 'Sim, eu crio maravilhas, faço sonhos ganharem vida e ideias despertadas! Bom, às vezes... Na maioria das vezes eu faço porcarias que quebram, mas é uma ótima profissão. Vou ensiná-lo aos que são dignos, por um preço.'
'You are my equal indeed! I shall teach you free of charge and take pleasure in my student besting me.'
'No, no, no, methinks you have much to learn still. Pay up, and I may still wish to teach you.'
